casebody.data:
Jonathan E. BRUNSON, Plaintiff,
v.
OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR OF THE STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA, Office of the 12th Judiciary, Office of the Clerk of Cumberland County, Office of the District Attorney for the 12th Prosecutorial District, Office of the Public Defender of the 12th Defender District, Office of the Cumberland County Sheriff, North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services, North Carolina Department of Social Services, North Carolina Department of Public Safety, North Carolina Department of Justice, Office of the North Carolina General Assembly, North Carolina Department of Human Resources, and the State of North Carolina, Defendants. No. COA18-571 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 18, 2018

DISMISSED.
